detailsData.title: Unmatched Client Service
detailsData.content: We deliver highly attentive service to our limited clientele. Our commitment to the family law community is unmatched in Santa Barbara, Ventura, and San Luis Obispo Counties.

detailsData.title: Expertise and Results
detailsData.content: Our team boasts five of the Central Coast’s most talented family law lawyers. We employ top staff in support to ensure the best outcomes for our clients.

detailsData.title: Early Planning and Reputations
detailsData.content: We settle the vast majority of our cases due to our early planning and courtroom reputations. Our clients enjoy the rewards of our serious approach to the profession.

detailsData.title: Complex Case Handling
detailsData.content: We routinely guide complex property characterization and valuation, 'family enterprise,' and income disputes. High stakes custody, parenting, and domestic violence matters round out our practice portfolio.

subHeading: We Deliver Unmatched Client Service, Expertise and Results in Family Law Matters in 'The 805' - And Beyond
valueProp: Herring Imming LLP is a boutique family law firm uniquely structured toward providing our limited clientele highly attentive service. Our experience and commitment to the family law community are unmatched in Santa Barbara, Ventura, and San Luis Obispo Counties. We boast five of the Central Coast’s most talented family law lawyers. We employ top staff in support.

testimonalData.text: Greg Herring provided exceptional service and expertise in my family law case.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: Ruston Imming's strategic approach led to a successful resolution of my complex property dispute.

testimonalData.text: The team at Herring Imming LLP is highly professional and dedicated to their clients.
